species.description: Humans are a blank slate, they can be anything they want to be.

effects: Advantage on Wisdom Saving Throws involving Bureaucracy
ethnicity.description:
Dealing with overbearing bureaucracy is a daily challenge in Brazil, so that navigating it becomes a skill.

Naturally easy-going, Brazilians have no trouble in making acquaintances and building relationships.

archetype.description:
Rio's violence creates almost a paranoid awareness of your surroundings, granting enhanced agility and defense reflexes.

The scorching heat builds natural resistance to fire damage, while the lack of cold exposure makes you vulnerable to freezing temperatures.

background.story: Born with an innate ability to question everything and learn at lightning speed, Jo√£o discovered his calling as a natural problem solver and Devil's Advocate. With 4 years mastering the arcane arts of web development, he has risen from a self-taught developer to a formidable Software Engineer. His journey began in the mystical realm of Radix Engineering, where he learned web development technologies from scratch and completed his internship six months ahead of schedule. Now, he wields the power of multiple programming languages and frameworks, capable of optimizing performance by 95% and leading teams to achieve 50-100% productivity increases.
ideals: Question everything - the best solutions come from challenging assumptions
Learn fast, adapt faster - knowledge is the ultimate weapon
Optimize relentlessly - every second and byte matters
bonds: Mentor to newer engineers, helping them navigate the codebase labyrinth
Guardian of performance optimization and deployment efficiency
Sworn protector of clean, maintainable code
flaws: Cannot resist playing Devil's Advocate, even when it's not needed
Sometimes gets lost in the pursuit of perfect optimization
Weak against legacy systems that resist modernization

weapons.name: Legendary MacBook Pro of Swift Development
weapons.description: A mystical device that responds to Jo√£o's natural problem-solving instincts

weapons.name: Mechanical Keyboard of Devil's Advocacy
weapons.description: Each keystroke echoes with the power of challenging assumptions

armor.name: Fast Learning Helm of Adaptation
armor.description: Forged from years of rapid knowledge absorption and adaptation

armor.description: Reduces app memory consumption from 1.6GB to 150MB

consumables.description: The essence of Jo√£o's most powerful ability - rapid knowledge absorption

consumables.effect: Instantly identifies flaws in any argument or system design

achievements.name: Performance Optimizer

achievements.name: Bug Slayer
achievements.description: Earned recognition for resolving issues and bugs swiftly during internship

completed.name: The Great Performance Optimization
completed.description: Optimized Dashboard performance with multiple charts containing hundreds of thousands of points and WebGL 3D view, reducing memory consumption by 75% and request durations by 95%

completed.name: The 3D Visualization Quest
completed.description: Led implementation of interactive 3D visualization of oil refinery plant, impressing stakeholders and expanding features

completed.name: The Deployment Pipeline Saga
completed.description: Created deployment pipelines reducing deployment time by 80% from 20 minutes to 4 minutes on multiple on-premises VMs

completed.name: The Spreadsheet Revolution
completed.description: Reimplemented Excel-like spreadsheet solution with more feature-rich library, saving USD 10,000 in development time

completed.name: The Internship Acceleration
completed.description: Completed software development internship 6 months ahead of schedule, securing Developer II position

inProgress.description: Conducting technical interviews, creating and reviewing interview projects, evaluating candidates
